Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Boolean/fromInt

Function bool fromInt( )
Description Convert an integer to a Boolean value: all non-zero integers are mapped to true, zero is mapped to false.
Examples 
rascal>import Boolean;
ok
rascal>fromInt(13);
bool: true
rascal>fromInt(0);
bool: false
